name: TortelliniSpaceMod
title: Tortellini Space Mod
author: Bonna
description: Several modified aspects. Not perfect balance but a lot of fun. 10x radar. Roboport 10x and fast charging. 10x & 100x speed and.  efficiency module. Logistic chest 10x. Barrel 25k. Iron and copper recipe 10x. and finally my review of the mod 'Scripts Factorio mod Script_Config_Start' = https://mods.factorio.com/mod/Script_Config_Start (all credits are yours)
